input: The product name is Omron Upper Arm Blood Pressure Monitor, 3 Series and the body of content of this product is[`Omron Upper Arm Blood Pressure Monitor 3 Series The OMRON 3 Series Upper Arm home blood pressure monitor is designed foraccuracy and stores 14 blood pressure readings for one user, andincludes a wide-range D-ring cuff (fits arms 9” to 17” incircumference). input: The product name is Omron 5 Series Wireless Upper Arm Blood Pressure Monitor and the body of content of this product is[`Omron Wireless Upper Arm Blood Pressure Monitor5 Series The OMRON 5 Series Wireless Bluetooth Upper Arm home bloodpressure monitor will measure, store and let you review 60 readings forone user, and includes a wide-range D-ring cuff (fits arms 9” to 17” incircumference). Correct position of body and arm Avoid eating, exercising or bathing for 30 minutes before measuring. It is suitable to rest quietly for 15 minutes before starting measuring. Be sure to sit in a chair with your back straight and with your feet on the floor and your arm supported so your elbow is at about heart level. Make sure the cuff lies about 2 or 3cm above the elbow, palm up, put it on the table. Be able to fit 2 fingers between your arm and the cuff. Stretch your arm forward on the desk and keep relaxing. User-friendly design, Blood pressure machine for home use, give you a healthy and simple life. Read more`, `Blood Pressure is Recorded with Two Numbers The Systolic Pressure (Higher Number) is the force at which your heart pumps blood around your body.The diastolic pressure (lower number) is the resistance to the blood flow in the blood vessels. Both Readings are Measured in Millimetres of Mercury (mmHg) A blood pressure reading between 120/80mmHg and 140/90mmHg could mean you`re at risk of developing high blood pressure if you don`t take steps to keep your blood pressure under control.`, `Frequently Asked Questions and Answers 1. Will the cuff fit large arms? Our adjustable blood pressure cuff comfortably wraps around most grow-ups arms, 8.7` to 15.7` in circumference. Measure your upper arm with a cloth tape measure to determine the best fit. 2. Why does my blood pressure fluctuate throughout the day? Individual blood pressure varies multiple times every day. The blood pressure is different even throughout the day due to weather, emotion, exercise, etc. It is also affected by the way you apply the cuff and measurement position, so please take the measurement under the same condition. Wait at least 3 minutes for another measurement. 3. Why do I get a different blood pressure at home compared to the doctor’s office? There is the ‘white coat’ effect, which means blood pressure usually increases in clinical settings. Home blood pressure measurement may vary as much as 10-20 points from ones taken at your doctor’s office.`] The following product can be categorized into four hierarchical levels:  level 1 : Health & Household level 2: Medical Supplies & Equipment level 3: Health Monitors level 4: Blood Pressure Monitors
